name: Smash n' Roll!
description:
Smash n' Roll is a hypercasual runner game, about people who bump into each other and jumble together to form a giant human ball. 

The game is based on a common trend in the hypercasual market, where players are presented with two choices, with one being obviously better than the other. "Smash n' Roll!" is my attempt at creating a variation of this trend. In this game, the player must choose between A) bumping into more people to increase the size of their ball, or B) smashing into a wall, losing people, and making their ball smaller.

The goal is to form the largest ball possible, to roll all the way to the end of each level.
